casebody.data:
Ricardo L. BAILEY
v.
FORD MOTOR COMPANY; Ford Motor Credit Company, LLC; and Kathleen Burns, individually. No. 20P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Adam H. Chames, for Ford Motor Company. Chris W. Haaf, Winston-Salem, for Ford Motor Company. M. Keith Kapp, Raleigh, for Ford Motor Company. Thomas L. Ogburn, III, Charlotte, for Ford Motor Credit Company, LLC, et al. Courtauld M. Young. James K. Pendergrass, Jr., Raleigh. Molly A. Whitlatch, Burlington, for Bailey, Ricardo L. Pamela S. Duffy, Burlington, for Bailey, Ricardo L.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of January 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
